metadata.name: Burnt Letters (Extended)
metadata.description:
« You don’t know what you’ve got till it’s gone 
You won’t know how to love until it’s over 
You’re running out the dark into the sun 
You wanna feel the heat but you’re getting colder »

A piece for when there's chaos inside you Directed by Maalavidaa  
Exclusive 1/1 Extended Version (Full Track)

Music Credit: Sasha & lau.ra - Burnt Letters
